pr_title: Update query parameters to include type annotation.

timeline.message:
Update query parameters to include type annotation.

Update query descriptions to prefix a code block with the actual type.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: nit: prob we should use the ROUTE for /beacon/chainhead
timeline.author: macfarla
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -47,7 +47,8 @@ public GetHead(ChainDataProvider provider, JsonProvider jsonProvider) {
       summary = "Get the head of the beacon chain from the node's perspective.",
       tags = {TAG_BEACON},
       description =
-          "Returns information about the head of the beacon chain from the node’s perspective.\n\nTo retrieve finalized and justified information use /beacon/chainhead instead.",
+          "Returns information about the head of the beacon chain from the node’s perspective.\n\n"
+              + "To retrieve finalized and justified information use /beacon/chainhead instead.",

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/data/beaconrestapi/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/artemis/beaconrestapi/handlers/beacon/GetHead.java b/data/beaconrestapi/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/artemis/beaconrestapi/handlers/beacon/GetHead.java
index 90c865bc4f..b3e355f94d 100644
--- a/data/beaconrestapi/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/artemis/beaconrestapi/handlers/beacon/GetHead.java
+++ b/data/beaconrestapi/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/artemis/beaconrestapi/handlers/beacon/GetHead.java

@@ -48,7 +48,9 @@ public class GetHead implements Handler {
       tags = {TAG_BEACON},
       description =
           "Returns information about the head of the beacon chain from the node’s perspective.\n\n"
-              + "To retrieve finalized and justified information use /beacon/chainhead instead.",
+              + "To retrieve finalized and justified information use "
+              + GetChainHead.ROUTE
+              + " instead.",
       responses = {
         @OpenApiResponse(status = RES_OK, content = @OpenApiContent(from = BeaconHead.class)),
         @OpenApiResponse(status = RES_NO_CONTENT, description = NO_CONTENT_PRE_GENESIS),
